command_list.command: execute as @e[type=player,distance=..20] at @s run playsound minecraft:senbaidevil record @p ~ ~ ~ 0.9

hit_command_list.command: execute as @p at @p run playsound epicfight:entity.hit.blade_rush_last block @s ~ ~ ~ 0.8

command_list.command: execute if entity @s[tag=fatal_draw_able] run indestructible @s set_phase 2
execute unless entity @s[tag=fatal_draw_able] run indestructible @s set_phase 1
